<SectionDefinition>

## Functions

### llvmGetPassPluginInfo() {#a2d26765d5eb741ed4b6f72c7fef51c99}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>::llvm::PassPluginLibraryInfo LLVM&#95;ATTRIBUTE&#95;WEAK llvmGetPassPluginInfo ()</>}>
The public entry point for a pass plugin.

When a plugin is loaded by the driver, it will call this entry point to obtain information about this plugin and about how to register its passes. This function needs to be implemented by the plugin, see the example below:


<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">extern &quot;C&quot; ::llvm::PassPluginLibraryInfo LLVM&#95;ATTRIBUTE&#95;WEAK</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">llvmGetPassPluginInfo() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  return &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">    LLVM&#95;PLUGIN&#95;API&#95;VERSION, &quot;MyPlugin&quot;, &quot;v0.1&quot;, &#91;&#93;(PassBuilder &amp;PB) &#123; ... &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>

Definition at line <a href="#l00111">111</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/passes/passplugin-h">PassPlugin.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<SectionDefinition>

## Defines

### LLVM&#95;PLUGIN&#95;API&#95;VERSION {#a76a304109af54526e3d2a471ac22885b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>#define LLVM&#95;PLUGIN&#95;API&#95;VERSION&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1</>}>
\\macro LLVM&#95;PLUGIN&#95;API&#95;VERSION Identifies the API version understood by this plugin.

When a plugin is loaded, the driver will check it&#39;s supported plugin version against that of the plugin. A mismatch is an error. The supported version will be incremented for ABI-breaking changes to the <code>PassPluginLibraryInfo</code> struct, i.e. when callbacks are added, removed, or reordered.

Definition at line <a href="#l00033">33</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/passes/passplugin-h">PassPlugin.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The public entry point for a pass plugin.</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
